page.title: 10STANTONBURY CAMPUS M. KEYNES
page.content: Stantonbury Campus is a large complex of buildings and sports fields which incorporates two comprehensive schools, Bridgewater Hall and Brindley Hall. Certain facilities are shared by the schools and also used by the community, these include a sports centre, a theatre, a health centre, a small shopping centre and a Saturday Music School. The Sports Centre has a learner pool and a large swimming pool. The pools are used by local schools during the day and by the community in the evenings. Sports catered for are squash, badminton, tennis, netball, football,karate, weight-lifting,snooker, gymnastics, trampolining, table-tennis and archery. Changing rooms, showers and a bar selling snacks and drinks are available. Remains of a Roman villa have been found on the site.
